title: World Leader in Corruption Control
description: In 2023, Denmark achieved a perfect score of 100 in the Control of Corruption Percentile Rank, indicating it is the top country globally in minimizing corruption.

title: Top Renewable Energy Producer
description: As of 2021, 78.91% of Denmark's electricity production came from renewable sources, excluding hydroelectric, placing it among the highest in the world.

title: Universal Financial Inclusion
description: In 2021, Denmark achieved 100% account ownership at financial institutions or mobile-money-service providers across various demographics, showcasing its commitment to financial inclusion.

title: Exemplary Government Effectiveness
description: Denmark's government effectiveness reached the highest possible percentile rank of 100 in 2023, reflecting its efficient public services and policy implementation.

title: High Statistical Performance
description: With an overall score of 95.26 in 2023, Denmark ranks among the top countries for statistical performance, indicating robust data collection and analysis capabilities.

title: Decline in Domestic Economic Claims
description: In 2023, Denmark experienced a -16.24% annual growth in claims on other sectors of the domestic economy, indicating a contraction in this area.
